context_bundle.summary: Clean Architecture enforces dependency rule: Dependencies point inward only. Layers: Entities (business rules) → Use Cases (application logic) → Interface Adapters (controllers, presenters) → Frameworks & Drivers (UI, DB). Inner layers know nothing of outer layers.

onboarding.quick_start: Clean Architecture enforces dependency rule: Dependencies point inward only. Layers: Entities (business rules) → Use Cases (application logic) → Interface Adapters (controllers, presenters) → Frameworks & Drivers (UI, DB). Inner layers know nothing of outer layers.
